text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- University teachers cancel strike after reaching agreement with government.
- Jobless graduates to go on hunger strike to protest against what they term the government's unfulfilled promises
- EU fish experts to visit Morocco for sanitary ports control and follow-up of European aid.
- Period to allow fish stocks to rest could be extended to four months starting 1997 because of dwindling resources.
